titleStmt.title: The cities warning-peece, in the malignants description and conversion: or, The round-head turn'd poet. Where a feast of prose and verse invites curiosity to be nibling.

publicationStmt.date: Written long since, but printed in the yeere that every knave and foole turn'd Cavaleere. [1643]

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Occasioned by John Taylor's "The conversion, confession, contrition, comming to himselfe & advice of a misled, ill-bred, rebellious round-head", 1643.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
